snippet.title: Call of Duty 4: Spec-Ops Mod Walkthrough
snippet.description:
Welcome to the Spec-Ops Mod!

Download COD4 Spec-Ops Mod: (Click Read More)
MODDB: https://www.moddb.com/mods/cod4-special-ops-missions/downloads/full-spec-ops-mod
MEDIAFIRE: http://www.mediafire.com/file/8g812h7jvuy44vs/Call_of_Duty_4_-_Spec-Ops_Mod.zip/file

With more than 12 custom singleplayer missions that are mainly inspired from MW2 and MW3 special ops game mode, this Call of Duty 4 mod is here with lots of action, stealth and story elements from the "Rooftops" Campaign! The mod is based on the "Rooftops" Campaign which is a custom story mod for Call of Duty 4 also developed by SPi.

COD4: "Rooftops" Campaign Story Trailer:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lbWTPDdZdiI

COD4: "Rooftops" Campaign Download:
https://www.mediafire.com/file/0dsfqf15espb3v6/Call+of+Duty+4+Rooftops+Campaign+Main+Release.rar

COD4: "Rooftops" Campaign Walkthrough:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nau7m3I4ksE

All spec-ops maps were released as standalone missions within the last two and a half years. This mod packs them all together, adds new features and it has fixed issues from previous versions.

Join my discord server for instant and direct updates about my projects:
https://discord.gg/Rs68sr4

Trailer:
https://www.dailymotion.com/video/x73p55i

Enjoy!

Timestamps:
00:00 - Menu
00:50 - Compromised
04:30 - Sabotage
07:46 - Manhunt
11:00 - Aces
15:19 - Major Mayor
16:50 - Ground Control
19:13 - Siege
25:38 - Rebellion
28:03 - Terminator
31:19 - Brothers In Arms
34:01 - The Lost Op
38:33 - DeJa Vu
42:55 - Sabotage Snowy
46:14 - Sabotage Christmas Special
